anya-e0105n23:1_0: Tesu tāva visuddhimaggaṁ ācariyabuddhaghoso saṅghapālattherena ajjhesito mahāvihārassa dakkhiṇabhāge padhānaghare mahānigamassāmino pāsāde pari. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n23:1_2: Ettāvatā ca “so panesa visuddhimaggo kena kato,
anya-e0105n23:1_5: kasmā kato”ti imesaṁ pañhānamattho vitthārena vibhāvito hoti.
anya-e0105n23:2_1: Tattha kimatthaṁ katoti etassa pana pañhassa attho ācariyeneva pakāsito. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0105n23:9_0: Visuddhimaggaṁ bhāsissaṁ, taṁ me sakkacca bhāsato;
anya-e0105n23:11_0: Tasmā esa visuddhimaggo visuddhisaṅkhātanibbānakāmānaṁ sādhujanānaṁ sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātassa visuddhimaggassa
anya-e0105n23:11_2: Appadhānappayojanavasena pana catūsu āgamaṭṭhakathāsu ganthasallahukabhāvatthāyapi katoti veditabbo.
anya-e0105n23:14_0: Icceva me kato”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā.
